name: My First 2D Platformer - 2D Game Kit
description:
My first ever 2D platformer. The level currently ends with two doors going opposite directions that lead to dead ends. In the future, I want to make them two different paths the player is able to choice between.

Character Controls:

A - Melee Attack

S - Ranged Attack

P - Pause

I - Interact

Up Arrow - Jump

Right Arrow - Move Forwards

Left Arrow - Move Backwards

Down Arrow - Crouch
